span.p: Deleted upon request\n(except as legally required)

span.p: Customer Info Database\n- Names, Contact details\n- Account IDs (identifiable)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Billing Database
- Transaction records
- Payment tokens
- Billing addresses

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Finance Data Lake\n- Transaction records (with customer IDs)\n- Usage data (pseudonymized)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: General Ledger System\n- Aggregated financial data\n- Limited personal data
